com.yworks.yfiles.view

Class GraphSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.GraphSelection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEnumerable<IModelItem>, IGraphSelection, ISelectionModel<IModelItem>, Iterable<IModelItem>

    public class GraphSelection
extends Object
implements IGraphSelection, IEnumerable<IModelItem>
    Simple implementation of the IGraphSelection interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphSelection

        public GraphSelection()
        Creates a new instance with no initial Graph assigned.

        In order to be always in sync with the structural changes in a graph, an instance should be associated with an IGraph using the Graph property.

      • GraphSelection

        public GraphSelection(IGraph graph)
        Instantiates an instance using the the graph as the model.
